data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Dover Castle cruise from Portsmouth to Bengal started at 1806-06-13
Ship: Dover Castle, Voyage: Portsmouth - Bengal, 1st Observer: George Richardson (Captain), Company: EIC
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
